nodes.text: Sarlacc Juice was a beverage found in the galaxy. The Weequay pirate Hondo Ohnaka regarded Sarlacc Juice as "strange," and after he consumed the drink at a party, he awoke on a stolen starship being pursued by TIE fighters. Ultimately, Ohnaka decided he would not recommend the drink.
Sarlacc Juice was first mentioned in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
